title: BooksPoint
description: Purpose is to Create This Book Store Provides the Facility For Customers To Buy Books Online Through  The Website. Customers Can Search For a Book By Title And Add it to Their Shopping Cart, And Then  Purchase it.

title: Expense Tracker
description: The Expense Tracker Project is a Web Application Developed Using React Js ,Node Js,Express Js,  MongoDB. Its Main Purpose is to Assist Users in Keeping Track of Their Expenses .

title: Todo List
description: TodoList: Efficient task management app using React and Tailwind CSS for sleek design, enhanced functionality, and intuitive user experience.

title: Music Player
description: A sleek and interactive web application crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, providing seamless music playback and navigation.
